definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: I'll pass on the fried potato crisp, but take the porridge.
sentences.chinese: 炸土豆片我不吃了，粥還是要喝的。

sentences.english: Fish and chips has always been a favourite dish in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 油煎魚加炸土豆片一直是英國人喜愛的一道菜。

sentences.english: Take the simple act of eating a potato chip.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們以喫炸土豆片來舉個例子吧。

sentences.english: Yes. Haddock and chips for me, please.
sentences.chinese: 好，請給我來點兒黑線鱈和炸土豆片。

sentences.english: Fish and chips is a popular meal in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 魚和炸土豆片在英國是很受歡迎的膳食。

sentences.english: I like to eat French fries.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡喫法國炸土豆片。

sentences.english: Fish and chips is John's favourite dish.
sentences.chinese: 炸魚和炸土豆片是約翰最愛喫的東西。

definition: stinky tofu/strong-smelling preserved beancurd/fig. rough exterior but lovable person
tofu skin (made by drying the skin that forms on the surface of soymilk during cooking, and therefore not actually made from tofu)
